1129530.name: Apsulov: End of Gods - Soundtrack+Art book
1129530.description:
Enjoy the atmospheric music composed by William Sahl for Apsulov: End of Gods while taking a look in the official art book.

Art book.

Take a sneak peek into the production of Apsulov: End of Gods with this digital art book containing 79 pages filled with a ton of lore, art, concept art and screenshots from both in, and behind the scenes of the game.
All the text in the art book is in English!

Soundtrack.

The thrilling soundtrack composed by William Sahl is a mix of modern music styles and traditional Norse instruments coupled with ambient soundtracks that will chill you to the core and includes:

  • Menu Theme
  • Welcome to the World
  • Into the Darkness
  • Successful Escape
  • Into the Future
  • Science of Magic
  • Realm of the Dead
  • The Apsulov
  • A New Friend
  • Show Me Everything
  • Icy Stare
  • They’re Back
  • Enough Questions
  • Be Careful In There
  • Drinkers of the Blood
  • Death of the Giant
  • The Climb
  • Hurry Up
  • Something I Want to Show You
  • The Well of Wisdom
  • The Ether
  • The Belly of the Beast
  • I’m Still Alive
  • Beginning of the End
  • The Bridge of Helheim
  • Creepy Crawlies
  • They’re Sleeping
  • Loss of a Mentor
  • Apsulov Main Theme
  • For My Family
  • To Helheim
  • Destroy or be Destroyed
  • The Choice
  • Unfulfilled Destiny
  • The Bringer of Ragnarok

All 35 tracks can be enjoyed in high quality MP3 and WAV.

Song files and Art Book will be placed in your Apsulov folder in the Steam directory:
...\Steam\steamapps\common\Apsulov End of Gods\Apsulov OST + Art Book
1129530.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
